# About

### The Course
**STAT 515: Visualization and Analytics with R**  
George Mason University  
Fall 2025

### The Author
**Student Name:** Sneha Sri
**Role:** Data Analyst & Researcher

### The Data
**Source:** [US Department of Education College Scorecard](https://collegescorecard.ed.gov/data/)
